body: Nearby Attractions       Nearby National Park Sites The National Park System includes 412 sites that, collectively, strive to tell America's stories. If you want to visit more than one national park site on your trip, the following are within 400 miles of Joshua Tree:  Mojave National Preserve, California—90 mi (145 km) Santa Monica Mountains National Recreation Area, California—165 mi (265 km) Cabrillo National Monument, San Diego, California—165 mi (265 km) César E. Chávez National Monument, Keene, California—188 mi (303 km) Lake Mead National Recreation Area, Arizona & Nevada—200 mi (322 km) Channel Islands National Park, California—205 mi (330 km) + a boat ride. It is not possible to drive to the Channel Islands. Manzanar National Historic Site, Lone Pine, California—251 mi (404 km) Sequoia & Kings Canyon National Parks, California—322 mi (518 km) Death Valley National Park, California & Nevada—335 mi (539 km) Devils Postpile National Monument, California—359 mi (578 km) Zion National Park, Utah—376 mi (605 km) Grand Canyon National Park, Arizona—389 mi (626 km) Pinnacles National Park, California—398 mi (641 km)
